name: customtable
description: A powerful and flexible table editor component built with React and TypeScript. It includes comprehensive customization options such as sorting, search fields, custom renderers and editors, right-click menus, scrolling, cell and range selection, copy & paste functionality, and validation. It utilizes the Tailwind CSS framework for modern and responsive styling. Includes unit tests and an interface for data store access.
author: Sebastian Baltes <sebastian.l.baltes@gmail.com>
